A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I have been a huge Star Wars fan my whole life. I thought it was awesome. The whole family loved it. The force awakens was good but it was just telling the same old story where as the last Jedi is able to tell a new and fresh story. Really don't get the bad reviews. If people just wanted the same Star Wars remake then watch the originals or the force awakens over and over.
